column4: i just ate a bacon and cheese sandwich (bacon cooked with cheese then the grease drizzled on the bread to "toast" it.)
and it was still cold when I bit into it
very tasty, i support bacon anyday
but the worms let me stay the same weight
i eat for 3 and i stay the same size
setu a streaming server and use any player that supports whatever streams it supports
i want the music played on the box
i didn't want xforwarding, meaning i wanted an interface that would run over http or something of the sort
well which part of my question didn't you understand?
if you want http based interface, AS I ALREADY TOLD YOU, install apache, then install a flash player.  there are billions on the net
if your going to dicker about http vs. some other protocol, i'm not sure i care to have thet discussion
not at all, its just me
glad you found something that fits your need
